description.text: You have an innate connection to a house of combat, and it's associated element.

sections.Benefit: When you take this feat, choose one of the following houses of combat styles; once this decision has been made it cannot be changed. While using this style, you gain a type of energy resistance based on the house you have chosen.
sections.Note: Note If using the optional Stamina Pool rules, the following trick may be used with this feat.
sections.Special: You may select Perfect Style multiple times. Each time you do so, you must select a different house to belong to.
